pages.title: Drone Bay
pages.text: The Drone Bay serves as a dedicated home base for your $(l:logicore:machines/drone)Drones$(). It acts as a parking spot and a high-speed charging station for your automated entities.

pages.title: Operation
pages.text: Drones assigned to this bay will automatically return when their internal energy is low. Once docked, the bay transfers its stored $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$() to the drone.$(br)$(br)The bay must be connected to your network via $(l:logicore:components/data_cable)Data Cables$() to receive power.

pages.title: Pairing & Display
pages.text: To link a Drone to a specific bay, simply deploy the Drone item on a block adjacent to the Drone Bay.$(br)$(br)The holographic display on the front shows the bay's current charge level and the name of the docked drone (if present).
A specialized charging pad with wireless cycle transmission capabilities.
